product_name: Kelty Eclipse +30 Sleeping Bag - Men's Short - 2011 Closeout
long_description: Sized for small sleepers, the Kelty Eclipse +30 short sleeping bag is fully featured to keep you comfortable on all your warm-weather camping adventures. Short length accommodates sleepers up to 5 ft. 4 in. tall. Features 2-layer, offset-quilt construction with CloudLoft(TM) synthetic insulation and a durable ripstop polyester shell; polyester/cotton lining feels soft on your skin. Full-length, 2-way locking zipper is backed by an antisnag draft tube to keep warmth in and cold drafts out. Internal loops provide attachment for coordinating Kelty fleece liner (not included) to increase the warmth of the bag. Unzip and open flat for use as a blanket; zip together with another bag to form a double-wide sleeping bag. External pocket keeps camping necessities such as headlamp, eyeglasses and lip balm within easy reach. Pillow pocket in hood allows you to stuff a pillow or extra clothing inside for comfortable support that stays in place throughout the night. Different width drawcords allow easy adjustments in the dark. Integrated storage-compression bag included with the Kelty Eclipse +30 short sleeping bag. Closeout.
